title: IAA Tonight | Kyler Murray's Contract Stipulation
description: Cardinals QB Kyler Murray agreed to a contract extension worth up to $230.5 million with $160 million guaranteed, but the contract comes with an addendum that requires him to study film for four hours per week during the season to stay in compliance with the new deal. LeSean McCoy, Leger Douzable, and Antoine Walker discuss if this is alarming for a star QB to be required to watch film. Plus, will the Detroit Lions improve from their three win 2021 season with the No. 2 overall pick Aidan Hutchinson?
author: smanderville@houseofathlete.com (LeSean McCoy, Leger Douzable, Antoine Walker)
